title: [Large-Scale] Language Transformation and Transcendental Learning Design Course for Net Generation Practitioners: Advanced Text Analysis and Expression Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency (grammar systems, specialized vocabulary), practical experience, and familiarity with digital collaboration tools (Slack, Notion, etc.)
context.additional_context: Conducted in a blended learning environment combining smartphone-based collaborative tools and offline activities, this course provides personalized feedback (grammar correction, vocabulary expansion suggestions, etc.) to improve learners' expressive and reading comprehension skills.

learning_goals: Learners will improve their practical language skills, including the use of specialized vocabulary and text structure analysis, by over 30% through project-based tasks.

Learners will apply self-directed problem-solving strategies—including analysis of complex grammatical structures and formulation of situational expression strategies—at least twice in collaborative projects utilizing digital tools.
Learners will analyze their learning processes through reflective journaling and develop improvement plans for academic writing and critical reading skills.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
